sentences.sContent: As for myself, I see obvious improvement in my piping and frosting, and that's all that matters to me in this stage!
sentences.sContent_eng: As for myself, I see obvious improvement in my piping and frosting, and that's all that matters to me in this stage!
sentences.sCn: 就我自己而言，我看到我的管道和无光泽面有明显的进步，这是我在此阶段的所有事。
